00045 void checkOptionName(const char* str, const char* option)
00046 {
00047     if(strcmp(str, option) != 0)
00048     {
00049         cerr << "unknown command option " << str << ", which should be " << option << endl;
00050         printUsage();
00051         exit(1);

00054 
00060 void append_rewrite_rule(RewriteRules *r, char* str)
00061 {
00062     char *col[3];
00063     const size_t n = tokenize2(str, " \t", col, 3);
00064     CHECK_DIE(n >= 2) << "format error: " << str;
00065     r->resize(r->size() + 1);
00066     string tmp;
00067     if (n >= 3) {
00068         tmp = col[1];
00069         tmp += ' ';
00070         tmp += col[2];
00071         col[1] = const_cast<char *>(tmp.c_str());
00072     }
00073     r->back().set_pattern(col[0], col[1]);
00074 }

00101 
00102 bool CSVRewriter::open(const char* fileName)
00103 {
00104     ifstream ifs(fileName);
00105     if(! ifs)
00106     {
00107         cerr << "fail to open CSVRewriter configuration file: " << fileName << endl;
00108         return false;
00109     }
00110 
00111     string line;
00112     while(getline(ifs, line))
00113     {
00114         if(line.empty() || line[0] == '#')
00115         {
00116             continue;
00117         }
00118 
00119         char* str = const_cast<char*>(line.c_str());
00120         append_rewrite_rule(&rules_, str);
00121     }
00122 
00123     return true;
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool CSVRewriter::rewrite(const string& src, string& dest) const
00127 {
00128     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00129     char *col[BUF_SIZE];
00130     CHECK_DIE(src.size() < sizeof(buf) - 1) << "too many characters in CSV entry";
00131     strncpy(buf, src.c_str(), sizeof(buf) - 1);
00132     size_t n = tokenizeCSV(buf, col, sizeof(col));
00133     CHECK_DIE(n < sizeof(col)) << "too many columns in CSV entry";
00134     return rules_.rewrite(n, const_cast<const char **>(col), &dest);
00135 }

00137 }

00142 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00143 {
00144     if(argc < 6)
00145     {
00146         printUsage();
00147         exit(1);
00148     }
00149 
00150     checkOptionName(argv[1], "--config");
00151     checkOptionName(argv[3], "--output");
00152 
00153     const char* configFile = argv[2];
00154     cout << "config file: " << configFile << endl;
00155 
00156     // CSV file rewriter
00157     CSVRewriter rewriter;
00158     if(! rewriter.open(configFile))
00159     {
00160         cerr << "fail to open config file: " << configFile << endl;
00161         exit(1);
00162     }
00163 
00164     const char* destFile = argv[4];
00165     ofstream to(destFile);
00166     if(! to)
00167     {
00168         cerr << "failed to create file " << destFile << endl;
00169         exit(1);
00170     }
00171 
00172     unsigned int count = 0;
00173     unsigned int ignore = 0;
00174     for(int i=5; i<argc; ++i)
00175     {
00176         const char* sourceFile = argv[i];
00177         cout << "converting source file: " << sourceFile << endl;
00178 
00179         ifstream from(sourceFile);
00180         if(! from)
00181         {
00182             cerr << "failed to open source file: " << sourceFile << endl;
00183             exit(1);
00184         }
00185 
00186         string line, dest;
00187         while(getline(from, line))
00188         {
00189             if(line.empty())
00190                 continue;
00191 
00192             if(! rewriter.rewrite(line, dest))
00193             {
00194                 cerr << "as no pattern is matched, ignoring line: " << line << endl;
00195                 ++ignore;
00196                 continue;
00197             }
00198 
00199             to << dest << endl;
00200             ++count;
00201         }
00202     }
00203 
00204     cout << "succeeded output to " << destFile << endl;
00205     cout << "total ignored entries: " << ignore << endl;
00206     cout << "total converted entries: " << count << endl;
00207     return 0;
00208 }
